alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:04PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 945 PM MST... At 904 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tanque Verde, or 8 miles east of Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, moving northwest at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Tanque Verde, Sabino Canyon Recreation Area, Catalina Foothills, Saguaro National Park East and Seven Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven
